quote: Your emotions are the slaves to your thoughts, and you are the slave to your emotions.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert
importance: Tracking your mood can provide valuable insights into your emotional well-being.

quote: The only way out is through.
author: Robert Frost
importance: Mood logging helps you identify patterns and triggers that affect your emotions.
